summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Randy L. Thompson. The documents primarily focus on Joachim S. Beer (aka Joachim F. Pehl), the step-son of Henry S. Beer. The reports detail derogatory information found on Joachim, including reports of a fire and disturbing the peace while serving in the US Army Berlin Brigade. The reports also include personal information, military service details, and security clearance status of Joachim F. Beer. Since Randy L. Thompson is not mentioned, no further information can be provided about them.
